page.title: 16The Youth Club:O.& N.Silton
page.content: The Youth Club is held in Kepwick every Wednesday (apart from during school holidays) for children from Over Silton,Nether Silton and Kepwick itself.There are about 40 members aged between 7 and l5 and one organiser. My name is Steven and I am 9 years old.I go to the club with my friend Philip in my Dad's car,it takes about 5 minutes from Over Silton.When we arrive we help to get out the equipment.We have games such as pool, snooker,table football,darts and dominoes.There are board games too in a wardrobe.After we have had a game I like to buy a drink of coca-cola and sit and talk with Philip.Crisps,sweets and chocolate are also available.When Robert comes in we put his breakdance record on the juke box and then we breakdance.Philip's Dad comes to collect us at 8 p.m.
